mapper.sql: id, trans_status, running_status, module_status, banknote_box_status, network_status, update_time, trans_time, equipment_no, prr_status, cim_status, maintain_status, connect_status
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tb_equipment_status
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_equipment_status (id, trans_status, running_status, module_status, banknote_box_status, network_status, update_time, trans_time, equipment_no, prr_status, cim_status, maintain_status, connect_status) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{runningStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{moduleStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{banknoteBoxStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{networkStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{transTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{equipmentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prrStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cimStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{maintainStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{connectStatus,jdbcType=CHAR})

insert into tb_equipment_status
id,
trans_status,
running_status,
module_status,
banknote_box_status,
network_status,
update_time,
trans_time,
equipment_no,
prr_status,
cim_status,
maintain_status,
connect_status,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{transStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{runningStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{moduleStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{banknoteBoxStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{networkStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},

mapper.update:
update tb_equipment_status
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trans_status = #{record.transStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
running_status = #{record.runningStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
module_status = #{record.moduleStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
banknote_box_status = #{record.banknoteBoxStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
network_status = #{record.networkStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
trans_time = #{record.transTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
equipment_no = #{record.equipmentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prr_status = #{record.prrStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
cim_status = #{record.cimStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
maintain_status = #{record.maintainStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
connect_status = #{record.connectStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},

update tb_equipment_status set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trans_status = #{record.transStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, running_status = #{record.runningStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, module_status = #{record.moduleStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, banknote_box_status = #{record.banknoteBoxStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, network_status = #{record.networkStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, trans_time = #{record.transTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, equipment_no = #{record.equipmentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prr_status = #{record.prrStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, cim_status = #{record.cimStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, maintain_status = #{record.maintainStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, connect_status = #{record.connectStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}

update tb_equipment_status
trans_status = #{transStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
running_status = #{runningStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
module_status = #{moduleStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
banknote_box_status = #{banknoteBoxStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
network_status = #{networkStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
trans_time = #{transTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
equipment_no = #{equipmentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prr_status = #{prrStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
cim_status = #{cimStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
maintain_status = #{maintainStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
connect_status = #{connectStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tb_equipment_status set trans_status = #{transStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, running_status = #{runningStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, module_status = #{moduleStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, banknote_box_status = #{banknoteBoxStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, network_status = #{networkStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, trans_time = #{transTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, equipment_no = #{equipmentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prr_status = #{prrStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, cim_status = #{cimStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, maintain_status = #{maintainStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, connect_status = #{connectStatus,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select te.id id,te.country country,te.detail_address detailAddress ,
(select tefl.down_reason from tb_equipment_faul_log tefl ,tb_equipment_status tes where tefl.equipment_id = te.id and tes.id = te.id and tes.running_status = '5' ORDER BY tefl.create_time desc LIMIT 0,1) downReason,
(select tefl.down_time from tb_equipment_faul_log tefl , tb_equipment_status tes where tefl.equipment_id = te.id and tes.id = te.id and tes.running_status = '5' ORDER BY tefl.create_time desc LIMIT 0,1) downTime,
(select tefl.recovery_time from tb_equipment_faul_log tefl,tb_equipment_status tes where tefl.equipment_id = te.id and tes.id = te.id and tes.running_status = '5' ORDER BY tefl.create_time desc LIMIT 0,1) recoveryTime
from tb_equipment_status tes ,tb_equipment te where
te.id = tes.id and tes.running_status = '1' or tes.running_status = '2'

select tes.* from tb_equipment_status tes,tb_equipment te where tes.running_status = "2"
and te.country = #{country}
and tes.id like "%"#{id}"%"
and tes.id = te.id

select tes.* from tb_equipment_status tes,tb_equipment te where tes.running_status = "1"
and te.country = #{country}
and tes.id like "%"#{id}"%"
and tes.id = te.id

select tes.* from tb_equipment_status tes ,tb_equipment te where tes.running_status = "0"
and te.country = #{country}
and tes.id like "%"#{id}"%"
and tes.id = te.id

select tes.* from tb_equipment_status tes,tb_equipment te where tes.running_status = "3"
and te.country = #{country}
and tes.id like "%"#{id}"%"
and tes.id = te.id

select tes.* from tb_equipment te ,tb_equipment_status tes where tes.id = te.id
and te.country = #{country}
and te.id = "%"#{id}"%"
and tes.ranning_status = #{ranningStatus}
and tes.trans_status != '0' and tes.trans_status != '4' and tes.trans_status != '9'
and tes.connect_status != '0' and tes.connect_status != '9'
and tes.banknote_box_status = !='0' and tes.banknote_box_status = !='5' and tes.banknote_box_status = !='9'
and tes.network_status = '0' and tes.network_status = '4' and tes.network_status = '9'
and tes.prr_status = '0' and tes.prr_status = '4' and tes.prr_status = '9'
